mapper.insert: insert into t_board_cmt (iboard, iuser, ctnt) values (#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard_cmt, A.iboard, A.iuser, B.nm writer, B.main_pic writerMainPic , A.ctnt, A.created_at createdAt FROM t_board_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard} limit #{startIdx}, #{row}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board_cmt WHERE iboard_cmt = #{iboardCmt} AND iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT count(iboard_cmt) FROM t_board_cmt WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board_cmt SET ctnt = #{ctnt}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE iboard_cmt = #{iboardCmt} and iuser = #{iuser}
